entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level rising to 1000 metres this afternoon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of wet snow mixed with rain before morning. Snow level 1400 metres lowering to valley bottom before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of wet snow mixed with rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of thunderstorms late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1200 metres in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
